column4: Hi. I have a thumb drive with ubuntu 9.04 which I use for tech support work. Anybody knows if/how can I upgrade it to 9.10? Or do I have to start from scratch?
how did you make the thumbdrive?

Hmm.. No sure how to properly  Upgrade that with a persistant home/save file. (if you are using one) You could just make a new one using the same tool then copy the casperrw file (i think thats the name) over to the new drive
